eu.monnetproject.math.sparse

Class TridiagonalMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.monnetproject.math.sparse.TridiagonalMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matrix<Double>

    public class TridiagonalMatrix
extends Object
implements Matrix<Double>
    A tridiagonal matrix, that is a symmetric matrix only the diagonal and values immediately above or below the diagonal are non-zero. i.e., x[i,i] = alpha[i] x[i,i+1] = x[i+1,i] = beta[i]
    Author:
    John McCrae
